com.whaleal.mars.core.query

类 Criteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Criteria
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CriteriaDefinition
    直接已知子类:
    GeoCriteria

    public class Criteria
extends Object
implements CriteriaDefinition
    Central class for creating queries. It follows a fluent API style so that you can easily chain together multiple criteria. Static import of the 'Criteria.where' method will improve readability. this is basic Criteria

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  Criteria.BitwiseCriteriaOperators
      MongoDB specific bitwise query operators like $bitsAllClear, $bitsAllSet,... for usage with bits() and Query.
      private static class  Criteria.BitwiseCriteriaOperatorsImpl
      Default implementation of Criteria.BitwiseCriteriaOperators.

      Custom "not-null" object as we have to be able to work with null values as well.

      • regexFlags

        private static int regexFlags(String s)
        Lookup the MongoDB specific flags for a given regex option string.
        参数:
        s - the Regex option/flag to look up. Can be null.
        返回:
        zero if given String is null or empty.

      • geowithin

        public Criteria geowithin(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry geometry)
        Creates a geospatial criterion using a $geoWithin $centerSphere operation. This is only available for Mongo 2.4 and higher.
        参数:
        geometry - must not be null
        返回:
        this.
        另请参阅:
        MongoDB Query operator: $geoWithin, MongoDB Query operator: $centerSphere

        返回:

        MongoDB Query operator: $nearSphere

      • geointersects

        public Criteria geointersects(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry geometry)
        Creates criterion using $geoIntersects operator which matches intersections of the given geoJson structure and the documents one. Requires MongoDB 2.4 or better.
        返回:
        this.

      • bits

        public Criteria.BitwiseCriteriaOperators bits()
        Use Criteria.BitwiseCriteriaOperators as gateway to create a criterion using one of the bitwise operators like $bitsAllClear.
        返回:
        new instance of Criteria.BitwiseCriteriaOperators. Never null.

      • orOperator

        public Criteria orOperator(Criteria... criteria)
        Creates an 'or' criteria using the $or operator for all of the provided criteria

        Note that mongodb doesn't support an $or operator to be wrapped in a $not operator.

        参数:
        criteria - must not be null.
        返回:
        this.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if orOperator(Criteria...) follows a not() call directly.

      • norOperator

        public Criteria norOperator(Criteria... criteria)
        Creates a 'nor' criteria using the $nor operator for all of the provided criteria.

        Note that mongodb doesn't support an $nor operator to be wrapped in a $not operator.

        参数:
        criteria - must not be null.
        返回:
        this.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if norOperator(Criteria...) follows a not() call directly.

      • andOperator

        public Criteria andOperator(Criteria... criteria)
        Creates an 'and' criteria using the $and operator for all of the provided criteria.

        Note that mongodb doesn't support an $and operator to be wrapped in a $not operator.

        参数:
        criteria - must not be null.
        返回:
        this.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if andOperator(Criteria...) follows a not() call directly.
